_header: The sun with his beams of brightness
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, Balade to Henry Somer — four 8-line stanzas

HunHM111.First Lines:
The Sonne with his bemes of brightnesseTo man so kyndly is &
                    norisshynge…
HunHM111.Last Lines:
…And þit this rowndel shul we synge & seyeIn trust of
                    yow & honour of your name
HunHM111.Attributed Title:
Cestes Balade & chanceon ensuyantz feurent faites a mon Meistre H.
                        Somer quant il estoit Souztresorer (f. 38v)
